name: scpr-style-guide
description: Product Style Guide for KPCC (Southern California Public Radio).

scripts.clean: rm -rf css/*.css && rm -rf img/* && rm -rf font/* && rm -rf js/* && npm run gem-clean
scripts.build: npm run build-css && npm run build-img && npm run compile-css && npm run build-js && npm run compile-js && npm run copy-css && npm run copy-js
scripts.build-css: mkdir -p ./public/css && node-sass ./src/css/main.scss ./public/css/scpr-style.css && node-sass ./documentation/_sass/scpr-docs.scss ./documentation/css/scpr-docs.css && npm run build-prefix
scripts.build-img: mkdir -p ./public/img && mkdir -p ./documentation/img && npm run copy-img && npm run svg

author: Southern California Public Radio
